summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Neighborhoods; accepting the proposal of Pacific Domains, Inc. to purchase and develop property located at 1221 East Barclay Court, Seattle, in the 12th Avenue Development Area; authorizing execution of a contract for sale of the parcel, conveyance of the parcel by special warranty deed, execution of closing documents, and administration of the transaction; and designating the disposition of sale proceeds.
committee: Neighborhoods, Growth Planning and Civic Engagement
